# UI TripleD

> Production-ready UI components, blocks, and pages built on top of shadcn/ui and Framer Motion.

**Last Updated:** 2025-12-03T10:07:35.077Z

## Table of Contents

- Components (75 items)
- Blocks (38 items)
- Pages (15 items)
- UI Elements (26 items)

### Components

- [Accessible Image Slider Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/image-slider-card): Image carousel card with keyboard support, reduced motion handling, and screen reader-friendly labels
- [Animated Card Stack](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-card-stack): Stacked cards that expand on hover
- [Cinema Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cinema-ticket): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode
- [Conference Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/conference-ticket): Animated conference ticket with glassmorphism effects and holographic details
- [Credit Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/credit-card): 3D animated credit card with flip animation to show CVV
- [Detail Task Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/detail-task-card): Task management detail panel with animated assignee chips and editor controls
- [Ecommerce Highlight Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ecommerce-highlight-card): Product spotlight card with blurred border, bundle selector, and fulfillment details
- [Glass Blog Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-blog-card): Glassmorphism blog card with image zoom, author info, and read action
- [Glass Checkout Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-checkout-card): Glassmorphism checkout card with payment method selector and input fields
- [Glass Order Summary](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-order-summary): Glassmorphism order summary card with item list and checkout button
- [Glass Wallet Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-wallet-card): Glassmorphism crypto wallet card with balance, trend, and action buttons
- [Hover Expand Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hover-expand-card): Card that lifts and expands on hover
- [Theater Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/theater-ticket): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode

#### Components

##### Chat

- [AI Chat Interface](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-chat-interface): Chat input with attachments, model selector, and accessible controls
- [Chat App](https://ui.tripled.work/components/chat-app): Fully functional chat interface with animated messages
- [Floating Chat Widget](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-chat-widget): Floating chat widget with AI agent selection dropdown and animations
- [Messenger](https://ui.tripled.work/components/messenger): Glassmorphism messenger workspace with accessible motion and quick replies

- [AI Loading Skeleton](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-loading-skeleton): Loading state with diagonal shimmer gradient and opacity wave
- [AI Response Typing Stream](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-response-typing): Character-by-character typing animation with natural pauses and thinking states
- [Animated Accordion](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-accordion): Accordion with smooth expand/collapse and rotate arrow
- [Animated Navbar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-navbar): Navigation bar with animated underline indicator
- [Animated Pagination](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-pagination): Pagination with smooth page transition indicator
- [Animated Profile Menu](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-profile-menu): Floating profile avatar that reveals quick action cards with smooth motion
- [Animated Sidebar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-sidebar): Sidebar with slide-in animation and overlay
- [Animated Tooltip](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-tooltip): Tooltip with delay and slide animation
- [Avatar Group](https://ui.tripled.work/components/avatar-group): Stacked avatar group with hover reveal and tooltips
- [Blog Typography](https://ui.tripled.work/components/blog-typography): Beautiful blog post typography with text, links, images, blockquotes, and code examples
- [Browse Folder](https://ui.tripled.work/components/browse-folder): Folder browser with animated tabs and content
- [Command Palette](https://ui.tripled.work/components/command-palette): Command palette with search and keyboard navigation
- [Comment Thread](https://ui.tripled.work/components/comment-thread): Nested comment thread with rich interactions and animations
- [Context Menu](https://ui.tripled.work/components/context-menu): Right-click context menu with nested items animation
- [Context Menu Bubble](https://ui.tripled.work/components/context-menu-bubble): Right-click reveals circular expanding radial menu with icons
- [Course Content Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/course-content-page): Interactive course page with video player, instructor details, curriculum sections, and progress tracking
- [Currency Converter Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/currency-converter-card): Finance conversion widget with animated inputs, simulated exchange updates, and contextual feedback
- [Drag-to-Confirm Slider](https://ui.tripled.work/components/drag-to-confirm-slider): Slider that activates action only when fully dragged to end
- [Expanding Search Dock](https://ui.tripled.work/components/expanding-search-dock): Minimal search icon that expands into full input with blur
- [Glassmorphism Statistics Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-statistics-card): Interactive statistics card with hover reveal and smooth transitions
- [Interactive Timeline](https://ui.tripled.work/components/interactive-timeline): Vertical timeline where elements animate and connect with lines on scroll
- [Mac Searchbar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/mac-searchbar): Mac-style searchbar with animated dropdown, glassmorphism effects, and smooth transitions
- [Magnetic Avatar Group](https://ui.tripled.work/components/magnetic-avatar-group): Stacked avatars that spread apart on hover showing tooltips
- [Multiple Accounts Switcher](https://ui.tripled.work/components/multiple-accounts): Glassmorphic account switcher with animated dropdown and accessible listbox controls
- [News Feed](https://ui.tripled.work/components/news-feed): Interactive news feed with categories, search, and animated cards
- [Projects Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/projects-block): Animated project card with hover effects, image zoom, and link buttons
- [Smart Hover Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/smart-hover-card): Card that detects cursor direction and reveals content from that side
- [Stacked Card Carousel](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stacked-card-carousel): Three stacked cards that shift and tilt dynamically on hover
- [Weather Dashboard](https://ui.tripled.work/components/weather-dashboard): Immersive weather dashboard with hourly charting, weekly outlook, and live air-quality alerts
- [Web Performance Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/web-performance-page): Real-time analysis of web vitals and performance metrics

##### Dropdown

- [Staggered Dropdown](https://ui.tripled.work/components/staggered-dropdown): Dropdown menu with staggered item animations

##### Forms

- [Animated Checkbox](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-checkbox): Checkbox with checkmark animation
- [Animated Radio](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-radio): Radio button group with selection ripple
- [Animated Select](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-select): Select dropdown with smooth open/close animation
- [Glass Account Settings Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-account-settings-card): Account management card with subscription overview and billing actions in glassmorphic style
- [Glass Forgot Password Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-forgot-password-card): Reset-password screen with glassmorphic styling and status messaging
- [Glass Profile Settings Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-profile-settings-card): Glassmorphic profile settings form with avatar upload, bio, and notification preferences
- [Glass Sign-In Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-sign-in-card): Glassmorphic sign-in panel with social auth buttons and email form
- [Glass Sign-Up Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-sign-up-card): Glassmorphic sign-up flow with social providers, email fields, and terms checkbox
- [Glass Verification Code Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-verification-code-card): Verification code entry with glassmorphic inputs, status messaging, and reduced-motion support
- [Simple Calendar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/simple-calendar): Calendar picker with date selection animation

##### Inputs

- [AI Glow Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-glow-input): Input field with dynamic glow that pulses based on typing speed - smart motion feedback
- [Floating Label Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-label-input): Input with animated floating label
- [Password Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/password-input): Password input with toggle visibility and strength indicator

##### Lists

- [Animated List](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-list): List with staggered item animations
- [Draggable List](https://ui.tripled.work/components/draggable-list): Reorderable list with drag and drop spring physics

##### Modal

- [Animated Dialog](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-dialog): Modal dialog with backdrop fade and spring animation
- [Bottom Modal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/bottom-modal): Cute bottom-centered modal with smooth slide-up animation and glassmorphism design
- [Fade & Slide Modal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/fade-slide-modal): Modal with fade backdrop and slide-up animation
- [Fluid Modal Transition](https://ui.tripled.work/components/fluid-modal-transition): Modal that expands smoothly from clicked trigger element using layoutId

##### Notifications

- [Notification Center](https://ui.tripled.work/components/notification-center): Multi-variant notification stack with accessible announcements, actions, and motion states

##### Tabs

- [Animated Tabs](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-tabs): Tabs with sliding indicator animation
- [Smart Tabs](https://ui.tripled.work/components/smart-tabs): Animated tabs with sliding pill indicator and smooth content transitions

- [Wizard Form](https://ui.tripled.work/components/wizard-form): Multi-step wizard form with animated transitions, validation, and progress tracking

- [Interactive Resume Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/resume-card): Professional resume template with animated sections and interactive elements
- [Minimal Resume](https://ui.tripled.work/components/minimal-resume): Vercel-inspired minimal resume with clean typography and grid layout
- [Professional Resume](https://ui.tripled.work/components/professional-resume): Clean, formal resume template suitable for corporate applications
- [Standard Resume](https://ui.tripled.work/components/standard-resume): A standard, professional resume layout with a sidebar, suitable for most industries.

### Blocks

- [About Us](https://ui.tripled.work/components/about-us-section): About us section with value cards, icons, and animated reveal effects
- [Bento Grid Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/bento-grid-block): Layered bento grid with imagery, metrics, and smooth motion reveals
- [Blog Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/blog-block): Animated blog posts grid with staggered cards, date/time indicators, and hover effects
- [Contact Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/contact-block): Contact form with animated contact info cards, working hours, and interactive icons
- [Contact Form](https://ui.tripled.work/components/contact-form-section): Contact form section with animated inputs, validation, and form handling
- [CTA Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-block): Call-to-action section with gradient overlay, animated buttons, and status indicator
- [CTA Hero Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-hero-block): Engaging hero section with email signup, video preview, and social proof
- [Dashboard](https://ui.tripled.work/components/dashboard): Interactive stock portfolio dashboard with status cards, data table, and detailed stock information modal
- [FAQ Accordion](https://ui.tripled.work/components/faq-accordion-block): Expandable FAQ section with smooth accordion animations
- [Feature Cards Grid](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-cards-block): Three feature cards with icons, hover effects, and glassmorphism styling
- [Feature Comparison Table](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-comparison-block): Interactive pricing comparison table with animated checkmarks and plan highlights
- [Footer Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/footer-block): Comprehensive footer with links, newsletter signup, social icons, and scroll-to-top
- [Gallery Grid with Lightbox](https://ui.tripled.work/components/gallery-grid-block): Filterable image gallery with animated lightbox and navigation
- [Glassmorphism CTA](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-cta-block): Call-to-action section with glassy card, gradient background, and animated buttons
- [Glassmorphism Hero](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-hero-block): Modern hero section with glassmorphism effects, animated background orbs, and CTA buttons
- [Glassmorphism Launch Timeline](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-launch-timeline-block): Frictionless launch roadmap with staggered motion, glassmorphism milestones, and paired CTA actions
- [Glassmorphism Listen App](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-listen-app-block): Music streaming block with glassmorphism player, curated highlights, and animated controls
- [Glassmorphism Logo Showcase](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-logo-showcase-block): Glassmorphism partner grid with floating motion, brand hints, and collaborative call-to-action
- [Glassmorphism Minimal Metrics](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-minimal-metrics-block): Focused metric cards with glass surfaces, subtle motion, and concierge insight CTA banner
- [Glassmorphism Portfolio](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-portfolio-block): Personal portfolio spotlight with profile portrait, narrative highlights, and animated social links
- [Glassmorphism Pricing](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-pricing-block): Pricing cards with glassmorphism effects, hover animations, and feature lists
- [Glassmorphism Product Updates](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-product-update-block): Multi-state changelog cards with glass overlays, status badges, and GitHub integration banner
- [Glassmorphism Testimonials](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-testimonials-block): Customer testimonials with glassmorphism cards, star ratings, and hover effects
- [Glowy Waves Hero](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glowy-waves-hero): Hero section with glowy waves effect
- [Hero Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hero-block): Personal portfolio hero section with animated avatar, staggered text, social links, and scroll indicator
- [Interactive Logs Table](https://ui.tripled.work/components/interactive-logs-table): Observability logs panel with animated filters, search, and expandable rows
- [Kanban Board](https://ui.tripled.work/components/kanban-board): Interactive Kanban board with drag-and-drop, glassmorphism styling, and task management features
- [N8N Workflow Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/n8n-workflow-block): Visual workflow automation builder with animated nodes, connections, and real-time execution monitoring
- [New Hero Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/new-hero-section): Modern hero section with gradient background, animated stats, and call-to-action buttons
- [Newsletter Signup Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/newsletter-signup-block): Animated newsletter subscription form with success state and gradient background
- [Notion Blog Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/notion-blog-page): Notion-style publishing playbook with rich text, toggles, and supporting visuals
- [Our Services](https://ui.tripled.work/components/our-services-section): Services section with service cards, badges, icons, and hover animations
- [Services Grid](https://ui.tripled.work/components/services-grid-block): 8-column responsive services grid with icons, features, and hover effects
- [Stats Counter Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-counter-block): Animated statistics counters with icons and gradient backgrounds
- [Stocks Dashboard](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stocks-dashboard): Interactive stock portfolio dashboard with status cards, data table, and detailed stock information modal
- [Team Section Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/team-section-block): Animated team member cards with avatars, roles, and social links
- [Testimonials Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/testimonials-block): Animated testimonials grid with staggered cards, star ratings, and hover effects
- [Timeline Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/timeline-block): Vertical timeline with alternating cards and animated progress line

### Pages

#### Page

##### About

- [About Us Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/about-us-page): Glassmorphism about page showcasing mission, values, and leadership with motion accents.

- [Auto-Revealing Heading](https://ui.tripled.work/components/auto-revealing-heading): Heading that reveals each letter/word with staggered motion on scroll
- [CTA Banner Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-banner-section): Animated call-to-action banner with gradient background and button animations
- [Dynamic Spotlight CTA](https://ui.tripled.work/components/dynamic-spotlight-cta): Floating spotlight follows cursor to reveal gradient CTA text with premium effects
- [FAQ Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/faq-section): Animated FAQ section with expandable questions and smooth transitions
- [Feature Grid Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-grid-section): Animated feature grid with staggered card animations and icon reveals
- [Pricing Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/pricing-section): Animated pricing cards with hover effects and feature lists
- [Profile Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/profile-page): User profile with gradient cover, stats, and posts feed
- [Scroll Progress Tracker](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-progress-tracker): Fixed progress bar that follows scroll and glows on section changes
- [Scroll Reveal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-reveal): Section that animates into view on scroll with intersection observer
- [Stats Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-section): Animated statistics section with cards and counters
- [Testimonial Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/testimonial-section): Carousel-style testimonial section with smooth transitions

##### Hero

- [Hero Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hero-section): Hero section with staggered text and button reveal
- [Staggered Text Hero](https://ui.tripled.work/components/staggered-hero): Hero section with staggered text reveal

##### Notifications

- [Toast Notification](https://ui.tripled.work/components/toast-notification): Animated toast notification popup

### UI Elements

#### Data

##### Charts

- [Accessible Cash Flow Chart](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cash-flow-chart): Interactive cash flow bar chart with keyboard focus, tooltips, and screen reader support

##### Progress

- [Animated Counter](https://ui.tripled.work/components/counter-up): Number counter that animates up from zero
- [Animated Progress Bar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-progress): Progress bar with smooth animation

#### Decorative

##### Background

- [Floating Gradient](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-gradient): Animated floating gradient background effect
- [Gradient Animation](https://ui.tripled.work/components/gradient-animation): Smoothly transitioning gradient background
- [Reactive Background Grid](https://ui.tripled.work/components/reactive-background-grid): Background pattern that reacts to mouse movement and click ripples

- [Animated Quote Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-quote-block): Quote that types itself in, pauses, then subtly breathes
- [Dynamic Tag Cloud](https://ui.tripled.work/components/dynamic-tag-cloud): Floating cluster of tags that drift and rearrange when hovered
- [Floating Info Panel](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-info-panel): Info tooltip that drifts up/down while fading in/out intermittently
- [Holographic Wall](https://ui.tripled.work/components/holographic-wall): Black wall with Pharaonic hieroglyphs and golden cursor light reflection
- [Liquid Cursor](https://ui.tripled.work/components/liquid-cursor): A liquid-like cursor effect that mixes colors on movement
- [Spotlight Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/spotlight-section): Container where mouse creates soft radial spotlight following cursor

##### Text

- [Typewriter Effect](https://ui.tripled.work/components/typewriter-text): Text that types out character by character

#### Micro

##### Badges

- [Animated Badge](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-badge): Badge with scale and spin animation

##### Buttons

- [Magnetic Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/magnetic-button): Button that magnetically follows your cursor
- [Ripple Click Effect](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ripple-click-button): Material design inspired ripple effect on click
- [Scale Hover Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scale-hover-button): A button that scales up smoothly on hover
- [Shimmer Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/shimmer-button): Button with continuous shimmer effect

- [AI Unlock Animation](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-unlock-animation): Premium unlock animation with particles, ripples, and loading states
- [Magnetic Cursor Link](https://ui.tripled.work/components/magnetic-cursor-link): Link that slightly follows mouse cursor within boundary and snaps back
- [Mood Gradient Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/mood-gradient-button): Button with background gradient that shifts based on hover angle
- [Morphing Action Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/morphing-action-button): A circular FAB that morphs into a rectangular action panel using layoutId
- [Notification Bell](https://ui.tripled.work/components/notification-bell): Bell icon that gently swings when new notification appears

##### Icons

- [Heart Favorite](https://ui.tripled.work/components/heart-favorite): Animated heart icon for like/favorite actions

##### Links

- [Preview Details Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/preview-details-card): Link card that reveals a smooth detail preview box on hover

##### Toggles

- [Elastic Toggle Switch](https://ui.tripled.work/components/elastic-switch): Toggle switch with elastic spring animation
